--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill was suprised that the Seeker was awake, and he shook a 
bit.
> "Whoa, sorry." he said. "That line, it came from the late great 
Optimus
> Prime, a Legend to all Autobots. I've heard great stories about him, 
but
> never met him. Cliffjumper and Beachcomber tell me a lot about him, 
they
> both served under him, and they both have a lot of respect for his
> memory." CLiffjumper than thought back. "He used to say that almost 
as a
> war cry, when they roared on to stop the Decepticons."

::REDHOT::

    Redhot silently listened to the others. When he spoke, his voice 
was respectful.
    "He must... have been... a great guy." he said. "Megatron, I 
guess, would... be the... Decepticon equivallent. Admittedly... for 
different and ...much more un...unplesant reasons." He chuckled. "It's 
too bad... Optimus Prime...ehhh...is not around? It..would have been 
an honor..to ...meet him."
    A brief pause lapsed before he spoke again.
    'What ever... happened to the... great Optimus?"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
